classification.installation_location: Primary service entrance / main distribution panel

overview.headline: Primary Level Service Entrances up to 1600 Amps
overview.primary_marketing_paragraph: While it isolates your downline equipment from external utility and lightning hazards, it also isolates your sub-distribution panels from internally generated surges to establish a lifetime grid of clean, conditioned power.
overview.technical_summary: The SurgePure Mach 4 SPD System for high-voltage WYE systems utilizes non-degrading Single Element (SE*) surge technology. It is engineered for large commercial and industrial electrical services where severe surge exposure and high fault currents are expected.

key_features: Your most vital primary level defense against today’s rolling blackouts and brownouts!
Unique fuse-links maintain safety of extremely high energy, non-degrading surge capacity.
Designed for close-coupled installation delivering ultra-fast response-time protection.
One half million amps of safe, solid, non-degrading lifetime surge protection.
Integral grid of coordinated primary and secondary non-degrading SPD technology ensures long-term 24/7 AC power system integrity.

safety_and_compliance.safety_rating_statement: Safety rated as SPD Type 1 & Type 2 with the TVSS industry’s highest safety SCCR rating of 200kAIC
safety_and_compliance.overcurrent_protection: Type 1 & Type 2, no breaker required / optional 40 amp breaker for fast panel installations (CODE RULE 26-420)

status_and_options.status_indicators: Lifetime Green LED Self Test ‘Protection Status Monitors’ For Each Phase
optional_features: Remote Aware (Opt.) automatic remote protection status alert

source.notes: 480Y/277V WYE configuration optimized for large commercial and industrial service entrances
